message.body: Question: if I put up flyers at haverford for a penn study, do you think anyone would do it? We have a 3-month long study, and we're having recruitment issues. Participants come in for 5 visits, travel is reimbursed.
Maybe but it's the end of the year. It is next weekend
Yeah, that's the problem we're having too. sigh, maybe once the summer people roll in. So you've got another week left? Good luck! Does your thesis stuff look good/interesting?
